```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
m <- sample(100:900, 1) # g
vi <- sample(10:30, 1) # m/s
vf <- vi - sample(1:9, 1) # m/s

ans <- (m/1000)*(vf + vi) # kg m/s
dis <- c((m/1000)*(vi - vf), m*(vf + vi))
sc <- num_to_schoice(ans, wrong = dis, delta = ans/10, format = FALSE)
sc$questions <- sprintf("$%g \\,\\mathsf{kg\\,m/s}$", signif(sc$questions, 2))
```

Question
========
A ball of mass \SI{`r m`}{g}, moving horizontally with speed \SI{`r vi`}{m/s} 
strikes a wall and rebounds at \SI{`r fmt(vf, 1)`}{m/s}. What is the magnitude of the 
change in momentum of the ball?

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(sc$questions, markup = "markdown")
```


Solution
========
The change in momentum is
$$
\Delta p = m \Delta v = \SI{`r signif(ans, 2)`}{kg.m/s}
$$
